ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Holiday Polling Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Holiday Polling') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True, ISPICKVAL(NS_HolidaySwitch__c,'Yes'), OR( ISBLANK(NS_CustomerNotifiedDateTime__c), ISBLANK(NS_DateSwitchNeeded__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Date Customer Notified, Holiday Switch & Switch Needed prior to closing the Case.
